title: Checking if Reports are legitimate
body:
I have been reported for the past few games for being AFK when I was playing and NOW because people didn't like my play style I get put in the low priority queue. Seriously? Does anyone else have this problem?

I suggest they take some time to review these reports because lets be honest, a hell of a lot of them are done out of anger and spite. I'm livid that I have to wait 20 minutes just to play League. It is a huge turn off.

replies.body: "play style" WUT PLAYSTYLE? THE AFK PLAYSTYLE? STAHP AFKING
I DO  NOT AFK. MY COMPUTER CRASHED ONCE.

If your computer crashed once, you would not have any sort of penalty, and would have to type 'I Agree' to the leaver buster warning.

Then, if you left more games, you would have a 5 minute queue penalty.

If you left more you'd have a 10 minute penalty.

If you left more, you'd have a 20 minute penalty.

You would not arrive at a 20 minute penalty, or any penalty, for a single crash.

lol quick question

Were you given this job because your handle is Tantram, or did you pick the handle when you got this job?

either way I dig it~
I've been Tantram since playing Dark Age of Camelot in 2001. Before that, I had a number of (not as good) IGNs.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkAwIaYB,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-05T22:53:39.469+0000)
>
> I've been Tantram since playing Dark Age of Camelot in 2001. Before that, I had a number of (not as good) IGNs.

Oh god DAOC! My first online game, the one I could never actually play because I had a 56k modem xD

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkAwIaYB,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-05T22:53:39.469+0000)
>
> I've been Tantram since playing Dark Age of Camelot in 2001. Before that, I had a number of (not as good) IGNs.

You're a really hard working person Riot Tantram. I always see you in these types of threads lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkAwIaYB,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-05T22:53:39.469+0000)
>
> I've been Tantram since playing Dark Age of Camelot in 2001. Before that, I had a number of (not as good) IGNs.

DAOC? that is EQ era. 

Did you play with Tryndamere and Ryze?
Fuck you Riot, you're bunch of idiots :)
Well I got none of that, straight to the 20min no warning.
You dont get low priority queue for anything but afk or leaverbuster.
Well I got none of that, straight to the 20min no warning. That's why it probably came from reports.
What exactly is your playstyle that the system is viewing as you being afk?
I am a very aggressive player, which is why I don't understand my ban.

If you were here banned for intentional feeding that would make sense.

But what could possibly be both aggressive and make you seem afk? Those two things are kinda on opposite sides of the spectrum.

Exactly! My computer crashed, I didn't even get 5 minutes to reconnect. No chance to reconnect at all. (this was recently) then I get hit with an afk low priority for "multiple games afk" when a remake was needed for 1.
So is that what this is about? A DC leading to a leaverbuster? Because that is working as intended not any kind of mistake.

That isn't, my computer crashed, once. I should not get a leave buster for that. I play my games and refuse to surrender. I don't like losing like a wuss. I will not leave and if I DC I come back. But I don't even get the chance to anymore after that remake thing. I always got back in the game.

It being a crash doesn't change anything about the situation.

Frequent technical issues are just as much a target of leaverbuster as rage quitters, not collateral damage.

You are talking about a 20 min low priority queue, that is chronic leaver status.

I. DON'T. A. F. K. It was a 1 time crash. If they are including the games that happened YEARS ago that is bull. I don't leave games, period. I don't know how many times I have to say it. It happen ONCE. ONE TIME. The number is ONE. Seriously I don't know how many times I have to say it. That is my problem.

It wasn't for one time. You are just drawing your own arbitrary line where you think the past shouldn't count.

I donno how far it goes back but it seems pretty far. A while back I had a string of different things happen in about a 2 week period that caused me to leave 4 games and I expected to get my first low priority queue on both the 3rd and 4th leave but it never happened. I have no doubt I was reported in those games and the only reason I can see for not being punished is my history of thousands of games with very few leaves. I think before those 4 leaves I had about 5 leaves in 5000 games.

You can work off that history but you need to play significant amounts of games without leaving or disconnecting to prove that things have improved. It takes a significant amount of games, though. Think like 100+ games per leaverbuster punishment you have received.
Thank you, that makes some sense. It has been a very long time since I've afk'd, but I guess I'll have to play more.
I take chances and I try to create openings. That is what I do.
You dont get low priority queue for anything but afk or leaverbuster. If you got reported for int feeding youd have a different kind of ban.
They report AFK.

As far as I know reports get legitimatize by what you report them for. Examples like, if you report someone for trash talking, but they didn't use chat would be thrown out because they can't be trash talking if they didn't use the chat. Or like for your situation, you report someone for all, but they were playing.

Although for your situations I will say as far as I know LPQ isn't linked with reports. The system only punishes you when it detects you were afk. This also goes with people trying to trick the system, like if you were sitting in base, or just dilly dally around/not playing the game. So if you were punished with LPQ it's because the system caught you being afk!

I do play that is the god damn problem. It says that I was afk in multiple games, which recently my computer crashed and I cam back but the teams were already remade. Out of my hands. One mistake and I get low priority que? I would understand if it were multiple occasions but I DO NOT GO AFK.
If that is the case then we need to have them look over their program because it obviously had flaws.
Reports don't have any effect on low priority queue. You get put in that queue because Riot detected you were afk. Stop afking.
I DO NOT AFK. I PLAY AND AM VERY SERIOUS ABOUT PLAYING AND LEARNING TO GET BETTER. MY COMPUTER CRASHED ONCE AND That is why I get banned? SERIOUSLY? NO that is Bull.
Noob
Thank you, please do reiterate that good sir.
